definitions.definition: A homogeneous mass of rock , not layered and without an obvious crystal structure.
A group of people from a locality, or sharing a collective aim, interest, etc.
examples: Big up to the Croydon massive !

main_definition: ( mineralogy ) A homogeneous mass of rock , not layered and without an obvious crystal structure.
secondary_definitions: ( MLE , slang ) A group of people from a locality, or sharing a collective aim, interest, etc.
